pages.text: $(#630000)This one's nasty; when attacked by a living entity and afflicted, the victim will receive a portion of their maximum health as True Damage, piercing practically all forms of defense. Past Yielding IV, the effect will deal this damage regardless of whether a living entity caused the initial hit.

$(#630000)Additionally, those afflicted with Yielding will have less immune time between each strike.$(br)Those $(l:threat/enhanced_mobs)Enhanced Mobs$()$(#630000) appear to apply this whenever they attack something once a Bounty has been placed. The effect increases in amplifier if they deal a critical hit.
